TestCase.name: testNoneRangeSortWithOffsetLimit
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC, b LIMIT 10 OFFSET 1

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first], offset=[1], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC, b ASC], offset=[1], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC, b ASC], offset=[0], fetch=[11], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNoneRangeSortWithOffsetLimit0
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC, b LIMIT 0 OFFSET 1

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first], offset=[1], fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNonRangeSortOnlyWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC OFFSET 10 ROWS

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], offset=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC], offset=[10], fetch=[unlimited], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNonRangeSortWithLimit0
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC LIMIT 0

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNonRangeSortWithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC LIMIT 5

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[5]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC], offset=[0], fetch=[5], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC], offset=[0], fetch=[5], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRangeSortOnlyWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC OFFSET 10 ROWS

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], offset=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC], offset=[10], fetch=[unlimited], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRangeSortWithOffsetLimit
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a DESC, b LIMIT 10 OFFSET 1

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first], offset=[1], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC, b ASC], offset=[1], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a DESC, b ASC], offset=[0], fetch=[11], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
